title: Brian Impact Foundation powers their search for the next generation of social innovators with Claude \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Brian Impact Foundation powers their search for the next generation of social innovators with Claude \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Brian Impact Foundation, a nonprofit focused on using technology to solve social problems, used Claude to help the team review 100x more candidates than the year prior, allowing the team to consider a much larger pool of innovators and create a more equitable process for identifying fellowship candidates.
